text: Scott Darrell Guptill (May 16, 1889 – 1949) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing Charlotte County from 1912 to 1935. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs Category:1889 births Category:1949 deaths
title: Scott D. Guptill
